docs.snippet: Injured striker Didier Drogba made a cameo appearance in a scoreless draw with its share of action.

docs.snippet: For many South Africans, public holidays usually revolve around the braai. Thanks to the World Cup, this year's Youth Day will be even more special.
docs.lead_paragraph: Jackie Bischof is a South African freelance writer living in Johannesburg.

docs.snippet: Round two of the group stage kicks off with host nation South Africa taking on Uruguay.
docs.lead_paragraph: Host nation South Africa's hopes of progressing to the elimination rounds of the World Cup took a serious hit after losing 3-0 to a solid Uruguayan team in Pretoria this evening.
